name: Ninja Blade - Ninja jump
description:
Experience the fast paced and insanely addictive jumping game with Ninja Blade with intuitive touch controls.

The fighting between our Ninja with his blade need your help to defeat daggers to servive. The Ninja Gaiden in blue are ready to overcome obstacles. All you have to do is just tap the screen and keep him away from dangerous weapons flying crazily in the sky. Be carefully, because this is a fast paced jump game. You must be really focused or your Ninja blender would fall and die anytime. The blade in his hand is the workhorse in this jump game. With the blade, Ninja can slice the obstructions and get more scores. Just look at such a cute Ninja, you would love to jump with him without any hesitance. Tap, tap and tap to make Ninja Blade jump, jump and jump!

Please remember that Ninja Blade is completely free to play but Ads will appear when the GAME OVER.
You can play this game alone or play with friends, family, kids… to see who can get the best score. Challenge them in this ambitious game, right now!
FEATURES
- Nice graphic, fun & very addicted Ninja blade game
- Simple tap control, easy to play and suitable for all ages
- Help this Ninja jump, slice the obstructions, get scores as high as possible.
- Immersive sounds & music
Defend your legacy! Be a real ninja!
Make your jump with this little time killer Ninja game. Download now to enjoy the experience in the night sky with the cuties Ninja!
Subscribe our channel & Play our new games every week.
If you face any problem while installing this app, please email us at:

we will try to fix it as soon as possible.
